title: Strictly’s Dianne Buswell rushed to hospital after 'being dropped by Dev'
text:
Dev has reportedly dropped Dianne in rehearsal (Picture: BBC)

Strictly’s Dianne Buswell was rushed to hospital after being dropped on her head by partner Dev Griffin in rehearsal, according to reports.

It’s claimed Dev lost grip of the professional dancer during a lift around his shoulders, and accidentally let her go as they practised their routine.

Speaking to The Sun, a source said: ‘Dev let her slip from his grasp and Dianne fell and landed on her head. It couldn’t have been worse.

‘It was horrible to watch Dianne lying prostrate on the floor.’

BBC staff are believed to have rushed to help and sent her to hospital, with Dev by her side who ‘looked in total shock’.

Dianne was released from North London’s Barnet hospital after doctors diagnosed whiplash, and was left consoling a ‘distraught’ Dev.

Dianne Buswell and Dev Griffin on Strictly (Picture: BBC)

Despite the incident, Dianne is believed to be back in shape and ready to perform on Saturday night’s Strictly live show.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Metro.co.uk has reached out to the BBC for comment.

Dianne and Dev have been one of the frontrunners of the competition, earning a total score of 49 points across the first two live shows.

It isn’t the only injury to have hit the show this year, with Jamie Laing forced to pull out the competition after injuring his foot.

Strictly Come Dancing continues on Saturday BBC One at 7.10pm.

MORE: Strictly Come Dancing’s AJ Pritchard slapped Saffron Barker so she would show ‘angry side’

MORE: Chris Ramsey accidentally pushed Karen Clifton down the stairs after making it to Strictly movie week
description: Dianne Buswell has reportedly been sent to hospital after an injury in Strictly rehearsals with Dev Griffin.
